short_summary: Supply, delivery and installation of Category 1, 2, 3, 5 and 6 furniture
description: Supply, delivery and installation of furniture to the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) in Winnipeg, Manitoba.
full_summary:
================

## MM100-078225 Furniture for CFIA Premises in Winnipeg

### RFP Details

| Characteristic | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | WS4398644894-AM004 |
| Amendment Number | 4 |
| Publication Date | 2024-02-13 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2024-03-08T14:00:00 |
| Amendment Date | 2024-03-05 |

### Description of Requirement

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is seeking bidders for the supply, delivery, and installation of Category 1, 2, 3, 5, and 6 furniture to CFIA premises in Winnipeg, Manitoba. The required furniture products are specified under UNSPSC code *56100000, which corresponds to "Accommodation furniture".

### Notice to Bidders

This solicitation falls under a category *GD* and follows the procurement methodology of Competitive - Open bidding. Bidders shall submit their bids according to the lowest price criterion.

### Contact Information

* Contracting Authority: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Location: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact Person: Kassan Abou Ahmad (PSPC/PWGSC), kassan.abouahmad@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Terms and Conditions

The tender closing date is 2024-03-08T14:00:00. Any bids received after this time shall be considered non-responsive. All bids must include the required supporting documentation; Late bids will not be accepted.

### Applicable Trade Agreements

This solicitation is open to bidders from countries participating in the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA). The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) also applies.  Trade agreements may include
